description:
Need to keep refreshing and seeing a website while the Touchpad is docked and in Exhibition mode? webOnEx displays a web browser with selectable auto-refresh while the Touchpad is docked.  


Usage:

* Go to Exhibition in the settings menu and make sure that "webOnEx" is checked.  You need to do this only once.
* Start Exhibition Mode, either by docking your device or by tapping Exhibition from the settings mode.
* Once in Exhibition Mode, select webOnEx from the menu, go to a website and set the refresh (if required) – that’s all it takes!

New:
* Set any page as the starting page
* New buttons to go to the starting page or to set the starting page
* Added 10 seconds refresh as an option
* Slide from left or right of screen for a thumb friendly menu (based on ThumbNav)
* You can hide the menu bar to get more browser space
* Fixed known issues

Questions, Feedback, Suggestions:

If you find any bugs, or have any feedback, or would like to suggest a new feature, please contact Mohit Sindhwani at mohits@onghu.com
